sideEffects.specificInfo: Common: ocular discomfort; blurred vision. Uncommon: nausea; bradycardia(slow heartbeat) ; punctate keratitis; keratitis; conjunctivitis; blepharitis; visual impairment; photophobia; dry eye; eye pain; eye strain (asthenopia); eye pruritus; eye discharge; eyelid inflammation; ocular hyperaemia. Rare: cataract; decreased corneal sensitivity; eyelid erythema; insomnia. Frequency Not Known: Hypersensitivity reactions (e.g. rash, urticaria, pruritus, anaphylaxis, angioedema); arrhythmia; asthenia; dizziness (as post-marketing report); Raynaudâ€™s phenomenon; vomiting; diarrhoea; palpitations; Chest pain; dizziness.

dosages.doseInfo: 1 drop of 0.5% solution in the affected eye(s) twice daily
